email.title: Weekly Digest

image.alt: Chocolate chip cookie on a blue plate
image.title: Chocolate chip cookie on a blue plate

email.text:
Hi everyone!
We hope you're ready for a week full of events!
Coming up we have a Meet Your Family Week, events with DRW and Nvidia, a workshop with CrowdStrike, as well as a Software Industry Q&A and a DoCSoc Games' Night!
email.heading: Meet Your Family Week
email.text: With lockdown just having begun in England, we realise it is more important than ever to stay connected to one another. That is why we have made this week Meet Your Family Week! We encourage you to meet up with your DoCSoc families and do an activity together such as play Among Us, virtual dinner and drinks, play an escape room, or something completely different! If your family still has not reached out to you, please email us and we will try reallocate some parents and children.
email.heading: Sponsors' Portal
email.text:
Searching for internships or placements? Check out our Sponsors Portal, where you can find out more details about our sponsors, read their blog posts and see their open internship/placement positions. You can also upload your CV and directly apply to our Gold and Silver tier sponsors!
You can access the portal at: https://portal.docsoc.co.uk/
email.heading: DRW - Who We Are?

event.text:
Join DRW as the head of their London office, Neil Dunn, will come in to discuss how traders, software developers and researchers interact with one another and what their day-to-day looks like. We‚Äôll also have a recruiter there to discuss the interview process.
DRW is a diversified trading firm with decades of experience bringing sophisticated technology and exceptional people together to operate in markets around the world and across many asset classes. We value autonomy and the ability to quickly pivot to capture opportunities, and so we operate using our own capital and trading at our own risk. Headquartered in Chicago with offices in the U.S. and Canada as well as Europe and Asia, we trade all the things you‚Äôd expect from a leading firm, including Fixed Income, Equities, FX, Commodities and Energy. We also have leveraged our expertise and technology to expand into three non-traditional strategies: real estate, venture capital and cryptoassets.
Phone one-tap: US: +13126266799,,97938614413#,,1#,691795# or +16465588656,,97938614413#,,1#,691795#
Meeting URL: https://drw.zoom.us/j/97938614413?pwd=SGNwQkIwS1R5RnFqbm5nckRvMkNNQT09
Meeting ID: `979 3861 4413`
Password: `691795`

email.heading: CrowdStrike: Help! My University Has Been Hacked!

event.text:
Where did the hacker go? He must have RAN SOMEWHERE
Mission: Can you defend Imperial College London and its COVID-19 Vaccine Top Secret Information or will it be stolen by the Bad Guys?
What‚Äôs Involved: Take part in a tabletop challenge with CrowdStrike experts to see if you can save your university from the eventuality of being hacked! With the guidance of our team, we‚Äôll take you through a real-life scenario and help lead an investigation to see if you can save the day and restore Imperial College London back to a safe state of play.
Logistics: This workshop will run for 1hr 30 minutes. Each student will be split into teams of 3-4 and entered into breakout rooms to discuss plausible solutions, to the attack that is underway. You‚Äôll then in return hear from our experts to help pave the way for what we do next. We hope you find a solution so your university isn‚Äôt left to ransom! Prizes will be given to the best and most unique suggestions for saving your university! We look forward to seeing you!

email.heading: Software Industry Q&A - Internships, CVs and the Pandemic

event.text:
Do you want to know about internships, how they changed during the pandemic & how to put up a stunning CV? Join us in this live Q&A Session about the Software Industry!
We have already prepared some standard pre-recorded material to bring you up to speed here: https://tinyurl.com/DoCSocIndustry101
However, for any other questions you may have, we will bring together a group of students ready to answer whatever questions you might have about the industry!

email.heading: DoCSoc Games' Night

event.text:
Come and Join DoCSoc in the first ever VIRTUAL GAMES NIGHT for EVERYONE! Spend some time getting to meet new people, playing fun games and having a relaxing evening. üéÆ
Feel free to bring along your dinner and some drinks! By attending, you will be entered into our prize draw for Deliveroo vouchers! üç¥üéâ
Join our discord server here to participate on the day: https://discord.gg/hc24ud6

email.heading: Accelerating Scientific Discovery in Health & Life Sciences

event.text: In this talk Jonny Hancox, Senior Data Scientist from Nvidia‚Äôs Healthcare team, will showcase the many tools and techniques that can be used to reduce the time it takes to move from ideation to insight. Much of this acceleration comes from the developments in hardware, but also the algorithmic developments that these hardware innovations have unlocked.

email.heading: Python 101

event.text:
One of the key attributes DoCSoc hosts is the Python 101 Introductory Workshop for not only DoC students, but all members of Imperial College London. We invite everyone from any disciplines and level of education. This will be a beginners level course for anyone who has very little to none knowledge in Python. Please click "Going" on Facebook so we can estimate the size of the interactive workshops.
Dates: every Tuesday 4-6pm GMT from Oct 20th to Nov 24th.
This week's lecture will cover advanced control flow, data structures and plotting data with matplotlib.
